Description: Heritage Square in New Carrollton, MD offers spacious 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. We’re at the center of everything you need. Description: Carrollon Manor Apartments in New Carrollton, MD offer spacious 1, 2 and 3 bedroom homes. We’re at the center of everything you need. Public transit is at your doorstep - MetroBus T14 stops here and a 10-minute walk to the New Carrollton MetroRail/MARC/Amtrak station. We're just one block to Rte. 450/ Annapolis Rd, 2 minutes to the Capital Beltway (I-495/ I-95), 5 minutes to Route 50 or Rte. 295/ Baltimore-Washington Parkway, 1 block to grocery stores and 5 minutes to 100's of shops, restaurants & services along Annapolis Road. 10 minutes to Woodmore Towne Centre, Boulevard at Capital Centre, PG County Sports & Learning Complex, Greenbelt Park, Bowie Town Center, Prince George's Community College & UMUC Academic Center. Apartment features include a large living area with room for lots of furniture, sliding glass doors open to balcony or patio, separate dining area with ceiling fan, large kitchen, natural light from large windows (we provide blinds throughout), nice views of green courtyards, and central heat and air conditioning. Utilities are not included in your rent – you pay for gas, electricity and water/sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include a relaxing swimming pool with sundeck, large play area with picnic tables, laundry and mailboxes in each building, a keyed main entry, on-site management and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.carrollonmanor.com.
